author: fitz
msg: Ignore generated version.xml

author: fitz
msg: Automatically include a version number in renditions of the book,
as reported by svnversion.
Patch by: Bruce A. Mah <bmah@packetdesign.com>
me
* doc/book/Makefile
($(BOOK_VERSION_SOURCE)):  Generate a version.xml
file that defines the output of svnversion as an XML entity.
($(BOOK_HTML_TARGET), book-html-chunk, $(BOOK_PDF_TARGET),
$(BOOK_PS_TARGET)):  Depend on the generated version.xml file.
book-clean:  Remove the generated version.xml file.
* doc/book/book/book.xml:  Include the generated version.xml file
and insert its svn.version entity in an appropriate place in the
title page.

author: sussman
msg: Continue work on issue #730:  restartable checkouts.
A couple cleanups from gstein's review of r5928.
* libsvn_wc/update_editor.c (add_directory): create entry in parent
*after* an entry existence check in parent.  and just set the kind
field, nothing else.
(open_root, open_directory): remove useless flag variable.

author: sussman
msg: Continue work on issue #730:  restartable checkouts.
Phase 2: make sure that an interrupted checkout (or update) leaves
behind enough information for 'svn up' to finish the job.
This means changing update-editor's mechanics: open_dir() marks the
directory as target-revnum and 'incomplete'.  add_dir() creates a new
directory with the same features, and immediately links it to the
parent.  close_dir() removes the 'incomplete' flag when a dir's
refcount hits 0.
* svn_wc.h (svn_wc_entry_t): new 'incomplete' field.
* libsvn_wc/entries.h (SVN_WC__ENTRY_ATTR_INCOMPLETE): new xml
attribute for an entry in the entries file.
(SVN_WC__ENTRY_MODIFY_INCOMPLETE): new bitflag value.
(svn_wc__entries_init):  take a new 'initial_rev' argument.
* libsvn_wc/entries.c (svn_wc__atts_to_entry): parse the 'incomplete'
xml attribute into the entry_t structure.
(svn_wc__entries_init): take a new 'initial_rev' argument and use
it.  also make sure a new THIS_DIR entry has 'incomplete=true'.
(write_entry): if set, write the 'incomplete' xml attribute into the
entry string.
(fold_entry): if bitflag is set, absorb 'incomplete' value.
* libsvn_wc/adm_files.c (init_adm): take new 'initial_rev' argument,
pass to svn_wc__entries_init().
(svn_wc__ensure_adm): pass revision into init_adm().
* update_editor.c (add_directory): create entry for new directory in
parent immediately, then create the new directory.
(open_directory): bump the revnum of the directory to the
update-target revnum, and mark it as 'incomplete'.
(open_root): for an update, do the same thing as open_directory, as
long as the wc root is the main thing being updated (i.e. the update
target is NULL).
(maybe_bump_dir_info): when refcount hits 0, remove the 'incomplete'
flag, and do nothing more.

author: kraai
msg: * subversion/svnlook/main.c
(generate_label): Eliminate uninitialized variable warning.
